help.title: MeasureMint Help Center
help.welcome: Welcome to the MeasureMint Help Center! Find quick answers, tutorials, and troubleshooting tips.

quickStart.title: Quick Start (30 seconds)
quickStart.step1: Open the app in your Miro board (click the Apps panel, search "MeasureMint")
quickStart.step2: Set calibration - Click a known distance on your image and enter its actual measurement
quickStart.step3: Start measuring - Click two points anywhere to measure distance
quickStart.step4: Done! Switch units anytime, measurements update automatically

general.title: General Questions
general.q1: Do I need to select an image before measuring?
general.a1: No! MeasureMint works anywhere on your Miro board. Just calibrate and measure.
general.q2: Can multiple people use the same calibration?
general.a2: Yes! Once calibrated, anyone on the board can take measurements using that calibration.
general.q3: Do measurements save with the board?
general.a3: Yes! Measurement lines and captions are standard Miro elements that save automatically.

calibration.title: Calibration Questions
calibration.a1: Accuracy depends on your calibration. With accurate calibration and high-quality images, measurements are typically within 1-2% of actual dimensions.
calibration.q2: Do I need to recalibrate for each measurement?
calibration.a2: No! Calibrate once per image/scale. All measurements use that calibration.

measurement.title: Measurement Questions
measurement.q1: Can I change units after measuring?
measurement.a1: Absolutely! Switch units anytime - all measurements update automatically.
measurement.a2: Yes! Use Multi-Point Distance and click points along the curve.
